subject: Simsonn manager lagging PC
description_text:
Dear sirs,
I would like to point out, that your hardware is working great! However the
software, Simsonn manager to be exact, is lagging and it's lagging the
whole PC.
Can there be a quick solution or does there need to be an update to the
software?
Once I close the Simsonn manager the lagging goes away.

Thank you for your response.

Zdenek Novotny

conversations.body_text: Hi Zdeněk Novotný,  We will release a new version in the next couple of days. The new version includes performance optimizations to prevent lag or stuttering. Additionally, if you are not using telemetry features, you can close the software while running the device.
